message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,400,000. I believe this is a fair price considering its value.  Let me know what you think.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to counteroffer at $1,350,000 for the product. I hope this proposal aligns better with your expectations.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer, but $1,350,000 is still below my minimum.  I'm willing to come down to $1,375,000. This is a fair price that allows both of us to make a good deal.  Let me know if you're interested.
Thank you for your latest offer, Alice. I understand your position, but I must stick to my budget. I am willing to pay up to $1,360,000 for the product. I hope this proposal is acceptable.
